properties.Identified_in_Last_Two_Planning: Not Used in Prior Housing Element
properties.Zoning_Designation_Current_Desc: Permitted uses: multiple dwellings; administrative and professional offices; banks; retail sales; eating establishments; personal services; recreational facilities; community education/training. Conditional uses: home occupations; administrative and professional offices; research and development; eating and drinking establishments; retail sales; personal services; movie theater; recreational faciltiies; special uses; public utilities
